title: In a Lonely Place
cast_members: Humphrey Bogart|Gloria Grahame|Frank Lovejoy|Carl Benton Reid|Jeff Donnell|Martha Stewart|Robert Warwick|Morris Ankrum|William Ching|Steven Geray

media.title: In a Lonely Place (1950 poster).jpg
media.caption: Theatrical release poster for the 1950 film In a Lonely Place

media.title: In a Lonely Place - trailer - 09.png
media.caption: Screenshot from trailer for the movie In a Lonely Place (1950), featuring stars Gloria Grahame and Humphrey Bogart. The moment from the trailer that doesn't appear in the final cut. As Laurel (Gloria Grahame) is talking on the phone to the detective at the end of the film, Dix (Humphrey Bogart) starts to leave. In the "lost moment," Laurel calls out Dix's name and they have one last embrace on the steps before he leaves.
media.attribution: Corporate author: Columbia Pictures Screen captures by Feydey

media.title: Grahame & Bogart In a Lonely Place Photo.jpg
